name: Lands of Taemoh: The Series
description:
Welcome to the World of Taemoh.  A world of adventure, of enchantment.  A world that is LITERALLY appearing right before your eyes.

Each entry into this series of game is known as an "Episode" and contains more and more of the map as, with each entry the world is revealed and added to.  Old characters may become allies in future games, past party members may rejoin your ranks, dungeons may shift and change as well as towns.  Even the world map develops and evolves with each new episode.

So come with us as we embark to a land where even the developer isn't sure of what will be added next.  The adventure awaits!
